casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Arthur O. ARMSTRONG. No. 544P06-3. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 6, 2007. Patricia Duffy, Assistant Attorney General, Howard S. Boney, Jr., District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 10th day of May 2007 by Defendant for Permission to File Petition:

"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference this the 6th day of December 2007."
